attributes.action: Whitley Bay - FA Vase Winners 2009, 2010, 2010. To Be Recognised by Parliament as an Outstanding Sporting Achievement.
attributes.additional_details:
Whitley Bay FC have won the FA Vase Trophy at Wembley for the past 3 years.
This is the only time a club side has won a Football Association Trophy 3 years in a row.
This should be recognised in parliament as an outstanding - the Football Association should award the current trophy to the Football Club - the manager, Ian Chandler, should be awarded a medal in the Queens Honours list.
Howay the Bay!
